Address.Line: Dept. of Chemical & Biomolecular Engineering, KAIST, 373-1 Guseong-dong, Yuseong-gu

Platform.Title: TwinChip_EColi_6k
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: The arrays are of 3- by 3-mm size and have an active surface area of 2.4 by 2.4 mm mounted onto the bottom of standard 1.5-ml microreaction tubes.

Sample.Title: L-threonine producing strain vs control strain

Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: indirect labeling method: aminoallyl-modified nucleotides were incorporated during the reverse transcription

Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: indirect labeling method: aminoallyl-modified nucleotides were incorporated during the reverse transcription

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Cy3 and Cy5-labelled cDNA probes were concentrated by vacuum-drying, dissolved in 20 ul of hybridization solution (30% formamide, 5X SSC, 0.1% SDS, 0.1 mg/ml salmon sperm DNA) and combined. The microarray was incubated with pre-hybridization solution at 42 C for 1 hr, washed in water for 5 min, and finally centrifuged at 650 rpm for 5 min. The combined hybridization probes were denatured by incubation at 95 C for 5 min. Hybridization was performed under a cover slip with a final volume of 20 ul inside a hybridization chamber (Genomic Tree, Daejeon, Korea). After hybridization at 42 C for 16 hr, the microarray was washed for 5 min in 2 X SSC and 0.1% SDS at 42 C, 10 min in 0.1 X SSC and 0.1 % SDS at room temperature, and 4 times for 1 min in 0.1 X SSC at room temperature. Finally, the microarray was dried by centrifugation for 5 min at 650 rpm.
Sample.Description: In the oligo chip, 5978 of 70 mer probes that cover the genomes of E. coli K12, O157:H7 (EDL933) and O157:H7 (Sakai) are spotted in duplicates.
Sample.Data-Processing: The mean signal intensity values of the duplicate spots were averaged and then normalized by the global normalization method. The genes showing the p-values lower than 0.05 were considered to be significant.

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: normalized log2 ratio (L-threonine producing strain/control strain)

Series.Title: Gene expression level during L-threonine production
Series.Summary: The comparative transcriptome profiling of L-threonine producing strain (TH07 strain harboring pBRThrABC) and control W3110 (lacI-deleted) strain harboring pKK223-3 has been analyzed using oligo nucleotide microarray. Keywords: comparative transcriptome analysis (between L-threonine producing strain and the control strain)
Series.Overall-Design: Samples for transcriptome profiling were taken at the OD600 of 5.13 (TH07 harboring pBRThrABC) and 5.21 (control strain), replicate = 2
